title: Does getting poked by Acupuncture needles hurt?
description:
Hi! It's the Trusty Narrator!

Our friends at MEL Science are BACK with amazing new monthly science kits for kids --- and a special discount for our Smartypants. Use code SMARTY at MEL Science or just go to this link and get started doing science, every month, right at home!

Who Smarted's? Sea Camp Live is BACK for an encore presentation Oct 18 19 and 20 due to popular demand. Click here to join now - $100 off expires Oct 11!

You NEEDle to listen to today's episode because it's all about - needles! Acupuncture may seem scary - after all it does involve sticking needles in your body. But actually it's very relaxing and helpful, and you'll discover how and why as you follow a Smartypants on their journey through healing with this ancient art.

Want to hear your name on Who Smarted? Leave us a great 5-star review on Apple podcasts, include your first name, and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode.

For free home science activities and helpful stuff for classrooms and homeschool sign-up for our free newsletter at www.WhoSmarted.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
